{{pp-semi-indef|small=yes}} {{pp-move|small=yes}} {{short description|American television and social media personality}} {{Use American English|date=March 2018}} {{Use mdy dates|date=August 2018}} {{Infobox person | name = Tila Tequila | image = Tila Tequila 2008.jpg | caption = Tequila in October 2008 | birth_name = Thien Thanh Thi Nguyen | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1981|10|24}} | birth_place = [[Singapore]] | home_town = [[Houston|Houston, Texas]], U.S. | alias = {{hlist|Tila Nguyen|Miss Tila|Tornado Thien}}<ref>{{cite web|url=https://twitter.com/theofficialdani/status/598159061553717248|title=dani campbell on Twitter|publisher=}}</ref> | occupation = {{Flatlist| * Model * television personality * singer * songwriter * actress * writer * blogger }} | years_active = 2001–present | partner = Casey Johnson (2007–10; Johnson's death) | children = 2 | module = {{Infobox musical artist|embed=yes | background = solo_singer | genre = {{Flatlist| * [[Hip hop music|Hip hop]] * [[pop rap]] * [[pop rock]] * [[electropop]] }} | label = {{Flatlist| * The Saturday Team * [[will.i.am Music Group]] }}}} }}
'''Thien Thanh Thi Nguyen'''<ref name="MTVname">{{cite web|url=http://www.mtv.com/news/1609113/tila-tequila-hit-by-death-hoax-on-twitter/|title=Tila Tequila Hit By Death Hoax On Twitter|last=Kaufman|first=Gil|work=[[MTV]]|publisher=[[Viacom Media Networks]]|date=April 13, 2009|accessdate=June 29, 2015}}</ref> (born October 24, 1981),<ref name="allmusic"/> better known by her stage names '''Tila Tequila''', '''Tila Nguyen''', '''Miss Tila''' and '''Tornado Thien''' is an American television and [[Internet celebrity|social media personality]]. She first gained recognition for her active presence on [[Social networking service|social networking websites]]. After becoming the most popular person on [[Myspace]],<ref name="SlateTila">{{cite web|url=http://www.slate.com/id/2139691/|title=Tila Tequila, the first star of MySpace|last=Weiner|first=Jonah|work=[[Slate (magazine)|Slate]]|date=April 11, 2006|accessdate=January 14, 2009}}</ref> Tequila was offered the opportunity to star in her own reality television series. Her bisexual-themed dating show, ''[[A Shot at Love with Tila Tequila]]'' (2007), aired for two seasons and became [[MTV]]'s second highest-rated series premiere of that year.
Born in [[Singapore]] and raised in [[Houston|Houston, Texas]], Tequila moved to [[Los Angeles]] in 2001 to pursue her modeling career. After being featured in numerous men's magazines (including ''[[Playboy]]'', ''[[Stuff (magazine)|Stuff]]'' and ''[[Maxim (magazine)|Maxim]]''), she made her reality television debut on the [[VH1]] show ''[[Surviving Nugent]]'' (2003). Besides her career in modeling and television, Tequila also pursued her career as a recording artist and author. She was the lead singer of the bands Beyond Betty Jean and Jealousy, before launching a solo career. Her debut single "[[I Love U (Tila Tequila song)|I Love U]]" was released in 2007 to mixed reviews. Despite having strong online sales, the song failed to enter any charts. Tequila followed with several independently released singles, including "[[Stripper Friends]]" and "Paralyze". In 2010, she released her second EP ''[[Welcome to the Dark Side]]''. Her book, ''Hooking Up With Tila Tequila: A Guide to Love, Fame, Happiness, Success, and Being the Life of the Party'' was published in 2008.
She has subsequently received negative attention for her support of [[Adolf Hitler]], as well as [[antisemitism|antisemitic]] and [[White nationalism|white nationalist]] comments,<ref name="Huffington Post">{{cite web|url=http://www.huffingtonpost.com/abraham-h-foxman/anti-semitism-the-week-in_b_4441621.html|title=Anti-Semitism: The Week in Review|last=Foxman|first=Abraham H.|work=[[The Huffington Post]]|date=December 13, 2013|accessdate=July 29, 2017}}</ref><ref name="Prestigiacomo">{{cite web|url=http://www.dailywire.com/news/5519/former-mtv-star-tila-tequila-put-shapiro-gas-amanda-prestigiacomo|title=Former MTV Star Tila Tequila: Put Shapiro In A Gas Chamber, Ship Him To Israel|last=Prestigiacomo|first=Amanda|work=[[The Daily Wire]]|date=May 6, 2016|accessdate=May 6, 2016}}</ref> which led to her expulsion from ''[[Celebrity Big Brother (UK TV series)|Celebrity Big Brother]]''.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/newsbeat/article/34093252/tila-tequila-thrown-out-of-celebrity-big-brother|title=Tila Tequila thrown out of Celebrity Big Brother - BBC Newsbeat|work=[[BBC News]]|date=August 28, 2015|accessdate=August 29, 2015}}</ref>
==Early life== Nguyen was born in [[Singapore]], where her family were [[Vietnamese boat people]], who arrived from [[Vietnam]] after the [[Vietnam War]].<ref name="allmusic">{{cite web|url=http://www.allmusic.com/artist/tila-tequila-mn0000280204/biography|title=Artist Biography [Tila Tequila]|last=Brown|first=Marisa|publisher=[[AllMusic.com]]|accessdate=July 17, 2008}}</ref><ref name="Bozell"/> Nguyen has an older brother, Daniel, and older sister, Terri.<ref name="hooking up">{{cite book|title=Hooking Up With Tila Tequila|last1=Tequila|first1=Tila|first2=Sarah|last2=Tomlinson|publisher=Scribner|edition=illustrated|year=2008|isbn=9781439101537}}</ref>{{rp|6}} When she was one year old, the family relocated to a neighborhood in [[Houston|Houston, Texas]] and were eventually admitted to a [[gated community]] run by a strict [[Buddhist]] temple.<ref name="MTV">{{cite web|url=http://www.mtv.com/shows/tila_tequila/season_2/cast_member.jhtml?personalityId=9876|title=Full Biography|work=A Shot At Love 2 With Tila Tequila|publisher=MTV|accessdate=July 17, 2008}}</ref> The family left the community when Nguyen was eight.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://hollowverse.com/tila-tequila/|title=The religion and political views of Tila Tequila|last=Kershaw|first=Tom|work=Hollowverse.com|date=February 24, 2013|accessdate=November 23, 2016}}</ref>
Nguyen was nicknamed "Tila Tequila" by friends due to her [[Alcohol flush reaction|apparent allergy to alcohol]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.mtv.com/artists/tila-tequila/biography/|title=About Tila Tequila|work=MTV|accessdate=November 23, 2016}}</ref><ref>[http://www.rhapsody.com/artist/tila-tequila "Tila Tequila: Biography"]. ''Rhapsody''.</ref> In her memoir, she would later explain that she felt "confused" and "lost" from various personal family and environmental issues. She turned to writing poems in an attempt to release powerful emotions, and friends outside the gang briefly helped turn her life around. At age 16, Nguyen ran away to [[Queens]], [[New York City]], for several months.<ref name="MTV"/> While still 16, she experienced a [[drive-by shooting]] in Houston. She reports having become pregnant and suffering a [[miscarriage]] the following year.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://blogs.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=blog.view&friendId=41736&blogId=516050834|title=The Truth Comes Out! I Was Pregnant With A Baby Boy!|publisher=Tila's MySpace Blog|date=October 26, 2009|accessdate=December 21, 2009|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20091030094101/http://blogs.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=blog.view&friendId=41736&blogId=516050834|archivedate=October 30, 2009|deadurl=yes}}</ref>
Nguyen graduated from [[Alief Hastings High School]] in 2000. She has cited her violent adolescence in Texas as her reason for becoming a model and moving to California in 2001.<ref name="hooking up"/> In a March 2003 interview, she revealed that she has taken some college classes but does not have a degree, stating, "I didn't want to go to college for an actual degree because there's nothing out there I like besides doing something that involves the [[entertainment industry]]."<ref name="Rodriguez"/>
==Career==
===2001–2005: Modeling career, Beyond Betty Jean and Myspace=== [[File:Tila Nguyen import model.jpg|thumb|upright|left|Tequila at a car show in December 2005]] Nguyen's career began at the age of 19 when she was discovered at the [[Sharpstown Mall]] by a ''[[Playboy]]'' scout and was offered a chance to model nude for the magazine. She did a test shoot, then eventually moved to Southern California and was featured as ''Playboy''{{'}}s Cyber Girl of the week on April 22, 2002,<ref name="Rodriguez">{{cite web|url=http://cars.ign.com/articles/389/389506p1.html|title=SRS Babe of the Week: Tila Nguyen|last=Rodriguez|first=Tyrone|work=[[IGN]]|date=March 13, 2003|accessdate=July 17, 2008}}</ref> and soon thereafter she became the first Asian Cyber Girl of the Month.<ref name="TilasHotSpotQuickBio">{{cite web|work=The Official Tila Nguyen Website|publisher=The Wayback Machine|url=http://www.tilashotspot.com/popups/short_biography.html|title=Quick Bio|last=Nguyen|first=Tila|year=2006|accessdate=July 17, 2008|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20060507192933/http://www.tilashotspot.com/popups/short_biography.html|archivedate=May 7, 2006}} (Retrieved through the Wayback Machine)</ref> A few more pictorials for the magazine followed.<ref name="Bozell"/>
At age 20, Nguyen acted on her interest in rock music and started looking for bands willing to let her join. She eventually assembled a band called Beyond Betty Jean, for which she was singer and songwriter. Beyond Betty Jean eventually broke up and Nguyen started working in recording studios to sharpen her vocal skills and wrote music.<ref name="TilasHotSpotQuickBio"/> Later, she became the lead singer of a band called Jealousy, which released a few songs online before breaking up. In 2003, Nguyen was a contestant on [[VH1]]'s ''Surviving Nugent'', a [[Reality television|reality TV]] show where participants performed compromising tasks and stunts for rock star [[Ted Nugent]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://www.vh1.com/sitewide/templates/img/lower_bg.gif|title=Surviving Nugent: Interviews: Tila – Contestant|publisher=[[VH1]]|accessdate=July 17, 2008}}</ref>
Nguyen gained further popularity through the [[Import scene|import racing scene]]. She has been featured on the cover of ''Import Tuner'' magazine, at car shows such as Hot Import Nights, and in the video game ''[[Street Racing Syndicate]]''.<ref name="Rodriguez"/><ref name="GameProSRS">{{cite web|url=http://www.gamepro.com/microsoft/xbox/games/previews/36729.shtml|title=Hands-On: SRS: Street Racing Syndicate|author=FUNKYZEALOT|work=[[GamePro]]|date=July 13, 2004|accessdate=July 17, 2008|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20080603121618/http://www.gamepro.com/microsoft/xbox/games/previews/36729.shtml|archivedate=June 3, 2008|deadurl=yes}}</ref> Nguyen joined [[Myspace]] in the fall of 2003 after getting booted off of [[Friendster]] multiple times.<ref name="TimeProfile">{{cite web|url=http://content.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,1570728,00.html|title=Tila Tequila|last=Grossman|first=Lev|work=[[Time (magazine)|Time]]|accessdate=January 28, 2016}}</ref> Time Magazine, in a 2006 profile of Nguyen noted her impact on the platform stating "Pre-Tila, your MySpace friends were mostly people you actually knew. Post-Tila, the biggest game on the site became Who Has the Most Friends, period, whoever they might be."<ref name="TimeProfile"/> also calling her, the "Queen" of the site.<ref name="TimeProfile"/>
===2006–2009: Solo career, and ''A Shot at Love''=== {{Main|A Shot at Love with Tila Tequila|A Shot at Love II with Tila Tequila}}
During the first season of [[Fuse TV|Fuse TV's]] dance show, ''[[Pants-Off Dance-Off]]'', on which a group of contestants [[Striptease|strip]] to [[music video]]s, Nguyen was the most frequent host.<ref name="Bozell">{{cite web |url=http://www.mediaresearch.org/BozellColumns/entertainmentcolumn/2007/col20071130.asp |title=Tila Tequila, MTV's Latest Poison |last=Bozell |first=L. Brent III |authorlink=L. Brent Bozell III |publisher=[[Media Research Center]]|date=November 30, 2007 |accessdate=January 5, 2008 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20071217182204/http://www.mediaresearch.org/BozellColumns/entertainmentcolumn/2007/col20071130.asp |archivedate=December 17, 2007 |deadurl=yes}}</ref> In April 2006, during the taping of an interview with [[MTV]]'s ''[[Total Request Live]]'' VJs, [[will.i.am]] announced that Nguyen had been signed to the Will.I.Am music group, a record label under [[A&M Records]]. Despite this major-label signing, Nguyen independently released her first single "[[I Love U (Tila Tequila song)|I Love U]]" through [[iTunes]] on February 27, 2007, justifying the independent release through her desire to become famous by herself.<ref name="allmusic"/> She also shot a music video for the song. In March 2007, Washington-based record label The Saturday Team released an EP called ''[[Sex (Tila Tequila EP)|Sex]]'', by Tila Tequila.<ref name="allmusic"/> On July 27, 2007, Italian website MusicBlob reported that The Saturday Team and distributor Icon Music Entertainment Services sued Nguyen over breaching her contract related to the album.<ref name="MusicBlob">{{cite web |url=http://www.musicblob.it/what-happened-to-tila-tequila-a-musicblob-exclusive.html |title=What happened to Tila Tequila|publisher=MusicBlob |date=July 27, 2007 |accessdate=July 27, 2007 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20070902050215/http://www.musicblob.it/what-happened-to-tila-tequila-a-musicblob-exclusive.html |archivedate=September 2, 2007 |deadurl=yes}}</ref> However, Nguyen claimed in a MySpace bulletin<ref name="MusicBlob"/> that the EP was not authorized for release by her, and was removed from most retailers. The Saturday Team won a legal case, making ''Sex'' available for digital purchase. Nguyen made an appearance as one of the 12 strangers in the first game on April 6, 2007 episode of [[NBC]]'s game show ''[[Identity (game show)|Identity]]''. On March 4, 2007, she made a [[cameo appearance]] on the show ''[[The War at Home (TV series)|The War At Home]]''.<ref name="IGNTilaComesHome">{{cite web |url=http://www.ign.com/articles/2007/03/15/tila-tequila-comes-home |title=Tila Tequila Comes Home|author=Staff |publisher=[[IGN]]|date=March 15, 2007 |accessdate=July 17, 2008}}</ref> She also appeared as a [[Hooters Girl]] in the 2007 film ''[[I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry]]''.
[[File:Tila Tequila 2008 MTV VMA.jpg|right|thumb|upright|Tequila at the [[2008 MTV Video Music Awards]]]] In May 2007, Nguyen began filming for a [[reality show]] which first aired on MTV on October 9, 2007, as ''A Shot at Love with Tila Tequila''. The program was a [[bisexual]]-themed dating show where 16 [[Heterosexuality|straight]] men and 16 [[lesbian]] women competed for Nguyen's affections, the twist being that the contestants were not aware of her bisexuality<ref name="MTV"/> until the end of the first episode. The ten-episode series was produced by [[SallyAnn Salsano]] and MTV.<ref name="Lafayette">{{cite news |url=http://www.tvweek.com/news/2007/09/mtv_greenlights_tila_tequila_d.php |title=MTV Greenlights Tila Tequila Dating Show, Debuts Oct. 9 |last=Lafayette |first=Jon |work=TVWeek |publisher=Crain Communications Inc. |date=September 7, 2007 |accessdate=July 17, 2008 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20080829021103/http://www.tvweek.com/news/2007/09/mtv_greenlights_tila_tequila_d.php |archive-date=August 29, 2008 |dead-url=yes }}</ref> The show led to a heated online debate between Nguyen and conservative Christians after an article appeared on ''[[The Christian Post]]'' on September 13, 2007.<ref name="Black01">{{cite news |url=https://www.christianpost.com/news/mtv-to-air-bisexual-dating-reality-series-29285/ |title=MTV to Air Bisexual Dating Reality Series |last=Black |first=Nathan |work=The Christian Post |date=September 13, 2007 |accessdate=May 9, 2018}}</ref> After seeing the article, Nguyen wrote an impassioned response in her blog on September 28, 2007, criticizing churches for "[[gay bashing|bashing]]" the [[gay community]] while thanking God for saving her life.<ref name="Bozell"/><ref name="Black02">{{cite news |url=https://www.christianpost.com/news/myspace-queen-tila-tequila-i-made-amends-with-god-29546/ |title=MySpace 'Queen' Tila Tequila: I Made Amends with God |last=Black |first=Nathan |work=The Christian Post |date=October 2, 2007 |accessdate=May 9, 2018}}</ref> The show premiered for a second season in April 2008 and became a popular gossip subject in Asian media, such as ''[[AsianWeek]]''.<ref>{{cite news |url=http://www.asianweek.com/2008/07/03/tila-happily-never-after-iii/ |title=Tila: Happily-Never-After III|last=Shin|first=Elise|publisher=AsianWeek.com |date=July 3, 2008 |accessdate=July 17, 2008 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20080717201728/http://www.asianweek.com/2008/07/03/tila-happily-never-after-iii/ |archivedate=July 17, 2008 |deadurl=yes}}</ref> The season finale premiered July 8, 2008, the winner being Kristy Morgan who declined her "shot at love".<ref>{{cite web |url=http://shotatlovecasting.com/ |title=Shot at Love 3 Casting |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20080930221106/http://www.shotatlovecasting.com/ |archivedate=September 30, 2008 |deadurl=yes}}</ref>
On October 9, 2007, Nguyen released her second official single, "[[Stripper Friends]]".<ref>{{cite web|url=http://music.aol.com/popeater/2007/10/10/tila-tequila-gets-a-little-help-from-her-stripper-friends/|title=Tila Tequila Gets a Little Help From Her 'Stripper Friends'|publisher=Popeater|accessdate=November 14, 2008|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20071012035613/http://music.aol.com/popeater/2007/10/10/tila-tequila-gets-a-little-help-from-her-stripper-friends/|archivedate=October 12, 2007|deadurl=yes}}</ref> A video premiered via [[Yahoo! Music]] on February 26, 2008 and was released to [[iTunes]] on March 4, 2008. The single failed to chart. In April 2008, the single "Paralyze" and its accompanying music video were released via [[Yahoo! Music]] and [[iTunes]].<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.tilashotspot.buzznet.com/web/tila/journals/tilatequila/entry/2158921/paralyze-teaser-clip |title=Tila's Hot Spot News |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20090615000715/http://www.tilashotspot.buzznet.com/web/tila/journals/tilatequila/entry/2158921/paralyze-teaser-clip |archivedate=June 15, 2009|deadurl=yes}}</ref> The "I Love U Remixes" EP was released to digital music retailers on April 7, 2009. On December 2, 2008, Nguyen released a [[self-help book]], ''Hooking Up with Tila Tequila: A Guide to Love, Fame, Happiness, Success, and Being the Life of the Party'' ({{ISBN|9781439101537}}).<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.publishersweekly.com/article/CA6560000.html|title=Scribner Signs Internet Celeb Tila Tequila|work=[[Publishers Weekly]] |accessdate=December 3, 2008 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20081023185436/http://www.publishersweekly.com/article/CA6560000.html|archivedate=October 23, 2008 |deadurl=yes}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=http://tv.msn.com/tv/tila-tequila-interview/?GT1=28129 |title=Talking to Tila Tequila About 'Hooking Up' |publisher=[[MSN TV]] |accessdate=December 3, 2008 |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20081205061556/http://tv.msn.com/tv/tila-tequila-interview/?GT1=28129 |archivedate=December 5, 2008 |deadurl=yes}}</ref>
===2010–2014: ''Welcome to the Darkside'' and hiatus=== [[File:Matchstik And Tila Tequila On The Red Carpet.jpg|left|thumb|upright|Tequila and Matchstick at the 14th Grammy Friends 'N' Family Party, 2011]] By 2010, Tequila decided to reinvent her image and changed her stage name to Miss Tila.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.avclub.com/article/stop-the-presses-tila-tequila-reinvents-herself-as-41038|title=Stop the presses! Tila Tequila reinvents herself as "Miss Tila" with new EP|last=O'Neal|first=Sean|website=[[The A.V. Club]]|date=May 11, 2010|accessdate=September 3, 2015}}</ref> Her first single released under the new moniker was "I Fucked the DJ", along with an edited version entitled "I Love My DJ".<ref name=abcnews>{{cite web|url=http://abcnews.go.com/Entertainment/video/tila-tequila-loves-dj-10364821|title=Tila Tequila Loves Her DJ|publisher=[[ABC News]]|date=April 13, 2010|accessdate=September 3, 2015}}</ref> Released under her newly established label Little Miss Trendsetter, the single received negative reviews and failed to be successful in charts. In May, she launched her celebrity gossip blog, MissTilaOMG.com, and the EP, ''[[Welcome to the Dark Side|Welcome to the Darkside]]'', which marked a musical departure from her previous material. Influenced by classical music and artists such as [[Nina Simone]] and [[Billie Holiday]], ''Welcome to the Darkside'' received more positive reviews.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.pr.com/article/1150|title=Miss Tila (Formerly Tila Tequila) Speaks Her Mind and Holds Nothing Back|last=Kugel|first=Allison|publisher=PR.com|date=April 19, 2010|accessdate=September 3, 2015}}</ref> However, it did not manage to gain commercial success.
Tequila began a tour supporting the new EP and at one of her tour stops in August 2010, she appeared at the [[Gathering of the Juggalos]], a music festival founded by hip hop duo [[Insane Clown Posse]]. She was repeatedly pelted with rocks and bottles among other objects, and she vowed to take legal action against the organizers and promoters for the event.<ref name="CNNTila">{{cite web|url=http://www.cnn.com/2010/SHOWBIZ/celebrity.news.gossip/08/15/tila.tequila.attacked/index.html?hpt=T2|title=Tila Tequila suffers cuts, but escapes juggalos attack|last=Duke|first=Alan|work=[[CNN]]|date=August 15, 2010|accessdate=August 15, 2010}}</ref><ref name="MTVTila">{{cite web|url=http://newsroom.mtv.com/2010/08/16/tila-tequila-juggalo-attack/|title=Tila Tequila's Juggalo Disaster Joins The List Of Wildest Stage Attacks|last=Anderson|first=Kyle|work=[[MTV]]|date=August 16, 2010|accessdate=August 16, 2010|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20100818155208/http://newsroom.mtv.com/2010/08/16/tila-tequila-juggalo-attack|archivedate=August 18, 2010|deadurl=yes}}</ref>
===2015–present: ''Celebrity Big Brother'' and return to music=== In May 2015, it was announced that Tequila was working on new music.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.dailyoffbeat.com/articles/8244/20150528/tila-tequila-new-music-promises-tour.htm|title=Tila Tequila Announces New Music, Teases Possible Tour|website=Daily Offbeat|last=Sokol|first=Tony|date=May 28, 2015|accessdate=June 29, 2015|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150601042004/http://www.dailyoffbeat.com/articles/8244/20150528/tila-tequila-new-music-promises-tour.htm|archivedate=June 1, 2015|deadurl=yes}}</ref> In June, she posted a snippet of the song "Drunk Dialing" on her [[Instagram]] and wrote it would be released in the Summer. In August, Tequila became one of the contestants on the [[Celebrity Big Brother 16|sixteenth season]] of [[Channel 5 (UK)|Channel 5]] reality series ''[[Celebrity Big Brother (UK TV series)|Celebrity Big Brother]]''. However, she was ejected from the house after just one day, due to many viewer complaints of her controversial statements made in 2013, when she posted [[Antisemitism|anti-Semitic]] comments and praised German dictator [[Adolf Hitler]] on Facebook.<ref>{{cite journal|last=Stutz|first=Colin|date=August 28, 2015|title=Tila Tequila Kicked Off 'Celebrity Big Brother' for Nazi Sympathizing: Report|url=http://www.billboard.com/articles/news/6678594/tila-tequila-kicked-off-celebrity-big-brother-nazi-sympathizing|journal=[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]|accessdate=September 3, 2015}}</ref> Tequila posted a snippet of "Drunk Dialing" again in September and confirmed it would be released by the end of October along with a music video.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://hollywoodlife.com/2015/09/29/tila-tequila-drunk-dialing-preview-new-song-instagram-video/|title=Tila Tequila Drops Preview For Upcoming Single, 'Drunk Dialing'|last=Benozilio|first=Shira|work=Hollywood Life|publisher=PMC Network|date=September 29, 2015|accessdate=September 30, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.idolator.com/7609615/tila-tequila-drunk-dialing-preview-listen|title=Music Is Saved: Tila Tequila Previews "Drunk Dialing," First New Single In Four Years|last=Daw|first=Robbie|website=[[Idolator (website)|Idolator]]|publisher=[[SpinMedia]]|date=September 29, 2015|accessdate=September 30, 2015}}</ref> In November, Tequila and her management confirmed the single would be released on December 4. Tequila also announced her own line of [[e-liquid]]s for [[Vaporizer (inhalation device)|vaporizers]] in collaboration with Blaze Vapors.

==Political views== In December 2013, Nguyen caused controversy by posting an article on her website titled "Why I Sympathize with Hitler: Part I", although she stated that her views on [[Hitler]] were not derived from [[antisemitism]] on her part, nor any feelings toward Jewish people.<ref name=NewsMax>{{cite web|url=http://www.newsmax.com/TheWire/tila-tequila-hitler/2013/12/10/id/541113|title=Tila Tequila Says Hitler Just 'Trying His Best to Help His Country'|last=Chilson|first=Morgan|work=[[Newsmax]]|date=December 10, 2013|accessdate=November 20, 2016}}</ref> She also posted pro-Hitler and antisemitic comments on her [[Facebook]] page,<ref>[http://www.tabletmag.com/scroll/155544/tila-tequila-jew-converts-to-sexy-hitler Tila Tequila, Jew(?), Converts to Sexy Hitler] Tablet Magazine. December 9, 2013.</ref> as well as photos of herself as a scantily clad [[Nazi]] posing in front of a photo of the [[Auschwitz concentration camp]]. These actions angered her Facebook followers, and resulted in Facebook closing her account and removing the material in question.<ref name="Huffington Post"/> In August 2015, Tequila became a contestant in the [[Celebrity Big Brother 16|sixteenth series]] of British television reality show ''[[Celebrity Big Brother (UK TV series)|Celebrity Big Brother]]'', but was asked to leave the programme on its second day when producers became aware of her comments and photos.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.bbc.co.uk/newsbeat/article/34093252/tila-tequila-thrown-out-of-celebrity-big-brother|title=Tila Tequila thrown out of Celebrity Big Brother - BBC Newsbeat|work=[[BBC]]|date=August 28, 2015|accessdate=August 29, 2015}}</ref> She subsequently apologized for her earlier comments, blaming them on depression and drug addiction.<ref>{{cite news|date=August 29, 2015|title=Tila Tequila apologizes for antisemitic comments after Big Brother exit|url=http://www.torontosun.com/2015/08/29/tila-tequila-apologizes-for-anti-semitic-comments-after-big-brother-exit|newspaper=[[Toronto Sun]]|publisher=[[Postmedia Network]]|accessdate=September 3, 2015}}</ref>
On May 6, 2016, Nguyen tweeted that [[Jewish-American]] political commentator [[Ben Shapiro]] should "be gassed and sent back to Israel" and later posted that "There are only two things in this world, for which I would gladly sacrifice my own life; the destruction of all Jews and preservation of the [[white race]]" and "You know what will help Asians earn respect? An Asian version of Adolf Hitler ... I want that person to be me; I want to save the world from this [[Zionist]] disease."<ref name="Prestigiacomo"/> In June 2016, Tila Tequila accused [[Sarah Silverman]] and the Jews of [[Jewish deicide|killing Jesus]] before saying the comedian was next on a "celebrity sacrifice" list.<ref>[http://www.jta.org/2016/06/22/news-opinion/united-states/sarah-silverman-target-of-anti-semitic-rant-by-ex-reality-tv-star-tila-tequila Sarah Silverman target of anti-Semitic rant by ex-reality TV star Tila Tequila] JTA, June 22, 2016</ref>

Spencer]], and posted photos on social media of herself doing a Nazi salute.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.thehill.com/blogs/blog-briefing-room/news/306915-alt-right-celebrates-trump-victory|title=Alt-right supporters celebrate Trump victory in D.C.|last=Yilek|first=Caitlin|work=[[The Hill (newspaper)|The Hill]]|date=November 19, 2016|accessdate=November 21, 2016}}</ref> One was posted to [[Twitter]] with the text "Seig heil!" [[Image:Undular bore waves over Arabian Sea.jpg|300px|right|thumb|Image of a likely undular bore wave]] In [[meteorology]], an '''undular bore''' is a [[wave]] disturbance in the Earth's [[atmosphere]] and can be seen through unique cloud formations. They normally occur within an area of the atmosphere which is stable in the low levels after an [[outflow boundary]] or a [[cold front]] moves through.
In [[hydraulics]], an undular bore is a gentle [[tidal bore|bore]] with an undular [[hydraulic jump]] pattern at the downstream ([[Supercritical flow|subcritical]]) side.
==In meteorology== [[Image:Undular bore wave two.gif|300px|right|thumb|[[NEXRAD]] radar image of undular bore wave]]
===Overview=== Undular bores are usually formed when two air masses of different temperatures collide. When a low level boundary such as a cold front or outflow boundary approaches a layer of cold, stable air, it creates a disturbance in the atmosphere producing a wave-like motion, known as a [[gravity wave]]. Although the undular bore waves appear as bands of [[clouds]] across the sky, they are [[transverse waves]], and are propelled by the transfer of energy from an oncoming storm and are shaped by gravity. The ripple like appearance of this wave is described as the disturbance in the water when a pebble is dropped into a pond or when a moving boat creates waves in the surrounding water. The object displaces the water or [[Transmission medium|medium]] the wave is travelling through and the medium moves in an upward motion. However, because of gravity, the water or medium is pulled back down and the repetition of this cycle creates the transverse wave motion.<ref name="Mauritania">{{cite web |url=http://www.arpal.org/Pubbl/paper/eumetsat-mauritania.pdf |title=Outflow from convective storm, Mauritania and adjacent Atlantic Ocean (13 August 2006) |author1=Martin Setvak |author2=Jochen Kerkmann |author3=Alexander Jacob |author4=HansPeter Roesli |author5=Stefano Gallino |author6=Daniel Lindsey |last-author-amp=yes |accessdate=2009-07-03 |date=2007-03-19 |publisher=Agenzia Regionale per la Protezione dell'Ambiente Ligure |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20110725013807/http://www.arpal.org/Pubbl/paper/eumetsat-mauritania.pdf |archivedate=25 July 2011 |df= }}</ref>
The undular bore's wavelength can measure {{convert|5|mi|km}} peak to peak and can travel {{convert|16|km/h|mph}} to {{convert|95|km/h|mph}}.<ref name="Mauritania"/> The medium it travels through is the [[atmosphere]]. There are several varying types of ‘‘bores’’ in different layers of the atmosphere, such as the mesospheric bore which occurs in the [[mesosphere]].
===Occurrences=== Rare but not unknown in a great many locations, the waves appear with some predictability and regularity in the Gulf of Carpentaria during Spring. They have been seen as frequently as six days in a row according to reports by the two pilots who have most experience with soaring these sometimes enormous examples of the undular bore, known in Australia as the [[Morning Glory cloud]].
==In hydraulics== [[File:Undular bore Araguari River-Brazil-USGS-bws00026.jpg|thumb|right|300px|Undular bore and [[whelp (tidal bore)|whelp]]s near the mouth of [[Araguari River (Amapá)|Araguari River]] in north-eastern Brazil. View is oblique toward mouth from airplane at approximately {{convert|100|ft|m|abbr=on}} altitude.<ref>Figure 5 in: {{citation| author1=Susan Bartsch-Winkler |author2=David K. Lynch |publisher=[[United States Geological Survey|U. S. Geological Survey]] |type=Circular 1022 |year=1988 |title=Catalog of worldwide tidal bore occurrences and characteristics |url=https://pubs.er.usgs.gov/#search:advance/page=1/page_size=100/advance=undefined/series_cd=CIR/report_number=1022:0}}</ref>]] [[File:Severn Bore near Over Bridge, Gloucester - geograph.org.uk - 346180.jpg|thumb|right|300px|Undular character of the [[Severn bore]] near [[Over Bridge]] on 9 March 2005.]] The term "bore" is also used to describe positive surges advancing in shallow waters. When the surge's [[Froude number]] is less than 1.4 to 1.7 (i.e. above unity and below a number somewhere in the range 1.4 to 1.7), the advancing front is followed by a train of well-defined free-surface undulations (called "''whelps''").<ref name="Chanson 2009">{{cite book|author=Chanson, Hubert |title=Current Knowledge In Hydraulic Jumps And Related Phenomena. A Survey of Experimental Results |url=http://espace.library.uq.edu.au/view/UQ:162239 |publisher=European Journal of Mechanics B/Fluids, Vol. 28, No. 2, pp. 191–210 {{doi|10.1016/j.euromechflu.2008.06.004}}|year=2009 |issn=0997-7546|authorlink=Hubert Chanson}}</ref> The surge is then called an undular surge or undular bore.
The undulations form a [[standing wave]] pattern, relative to the undular bore front. So, the [[phase velocity]] (propagation velocity relative to still water) of the undulations is just high enough to keep the undulations stationary relative to the bore front. Now, in [[water wave]]s, the [[group velocity]] (which is also the energy-transport velocity) is less than the [[phase velocity]]. Therefore, on average, wave energy of the undulations is transported away from the front, and contributing to the energy loss in the region of the front.<ref>{{citation | title=On cnoidal waves and bores | first1=T.B. | last1=Benjamin | authorlink1=Brooke Benjamin | first2=M.J. | last2=Lighthill | authorlink2=James Lighthill | year=1954 | journal=Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series A, Mathematical and Physical Sciences | volume=224 | pages=448–460 | doi=10.1098/rspa.1954.0172 | issue=1159 |bibcode = 1954RSPSA.224..448B }}</ref>
A related occurrence of positive surges is the [[tidal bore]] in [[estuary|estuaries]].

[[Image:Soppressata_sottovuoto.JPG|thumb|right|150px]] '''Vacuum packing''' is a method of [[packaging]] that removes air from the package prior to sealing. This method involves (manually or automatically) placing items in a plastic film package, removing air from inside, and sealing the package.<ref>{{Citation | last = Perdue | first = R | chapter = Vacuum Packaging | date =2009 | editor-last = Yam | editor-first = K L | title = Encyclopedia of Packaging Technology | publisher = Wiley | publication-date = 2010 | isbn = 978-0-470-08704-6 }}</ref> [[Shrink film]] is sometimes used to have a tight fit to the contents. The intent of vacuum packing is usually to remove oxygen from the container to extend the [[shelf life]] of foods and, with flexible package forms, to reduce the volume of the contents and package.<ref> {{Cite book | last = Soroka | first = W | title = Illustrated Glossary of Packaging Terminology | publisher = Institute of Packaging Professionals | edition = Second | url = http://www.iopp.org/i4a/pages/Index.cfm?pageID=1 }}</ref>
Vacuum packing reduces atmospheric oxygen, limiting the growth of [[aerobic bacteria]] or [[fungus|fungi]], and preventing the [[evaporation]] of [[volatility (chemistry)|volatile]] components. It is also commonly used to store dry foods over a long period of time, such as [[cereal]]s, [[Nut (fruit)|nut]]s, cured [[meat]]s, [[cheese]], smoked [[fish]], [[coffee]], and potato chips ([[crisps]]). On a more short term basis, vacuum packing can also be used to store fresh foods, such as vegetables, meats, and liquids, because it inhibits bacterial growth.
Vacuum packing greatly reduces the bulk of non-food items. For example, clothing and bedding can be stored in bags evacuated with a domestic [[vacuum cleaner]] or a dedicated vacuum sealer. This technique is sometimes used to compact [[household waste]], for example where a charge is made for each full bag collected.
Vacuum packaging products, using [[plastic bag]]s, [[Canning|canisters]], [[bottle]]s, or [[mason jar]]s, are available for home use.
For delicate food items which might be crushed by the vacuum packing process (such as potato chips), an alternative is to replace the interior gas with nitrogen. This has the same effect of inhibiting deterioration due to the removal of oxygen.
== External sealers ==
External vacuum sealers involve a bag being attached to the vacuum-sealing machine externally. The machine will remove the air and seal the bag, which is all done outside the machine. A [[heat sealer]] is often used to seal the pack.
== Single Vacuum Chamber Machines == [[File:Vacuum Packaging Machine.webm|thumb|This video shows vacuum packaging of rice.]] [[Image:Tabletop Vacuum Packaging Machine.png|thumb|right|150px|Tabletop Vacuum Packaging Machine]] Single chamber sealers require the entire product to be placed within the machine. Like external sealers, a plastic bag is typically used for packaging. Once the product is placed in the machine, the lid is closed and air is removed. Then, there is a heat seal inside the chamber that will seal the bag, after sealing the bag the chamber is refilled with air by the automatic opening of a vent to the outside. This oncoming pressure squeezes all remaining air in the bag. The lid is then opened and the product removed. Chamber sealers are typically used for low-to-medium-volume packaging. This style of vacuum machine is also capable of sealing liquids due to equal pressure in the chamber and the bag eliminating the risk of the liquid being suck out of the open edge of the bag.
== Double Vacuum Chamber Machines == [[File:XtraVac Double Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine.png|thumb|left| Double Chamber Vacuum Packaging Machine]]
Double chamber sealers require the entire product to be placed in a plastic bag within the machine. Once the product is placed in the machine on the seal bar, the lid is closed and air is removed. Then a seal bar inside the chamber seals the product in the bag, after sealing the bag the chamber is refilled with air by the automatic opening of a vent to the outside. This oncoming pressure squeezes all remaining air in the bag. The lid is then opened and the product removed. Double chamber sealers are typically used for medium-volume packaging, and also have the capability to vacuum seal liquids. The lid generally swings from one side to another, increasing production speed over a single chamber model. Double chamber vacuum packaging machines generally have either spring-weighted lids or fully automatic lids.
Double chamber vacuum packaging machines are commonly used for: * Fresh Meat * Processed Meat * Cheese (hard and soft) * Candy & Chocolate
== Automatic Belt Vacuum Chamber Machines ==
[[File:VC999 K9 Automatic Belt Vacuum Chamber Machine.jpg|thumb|left|Automatic Belt Vacuum Chamber Machine. Automatic belt vacuum chamber machines offer vastly increased speed and automation and accommodate large products.]] Automatic belt chamber sealers require the entire product to be placed in a plastic bag or flow wrapped pouch within the machine. The product travels on the conveyor belt, it is automatically positioned in the machine on the seal bar, the lid is closed and air is removed. Then a seal bar inside the chamber seals the product in the bag. After sealing the bag, the chamber is refilled with air by the automatic opening of a vent to the outside. This oncoming pressure squeezes all remaining air in the bag. The lid is then opened and the product removed. Automatic belt vacuum chamber machines are typically used for high-speed packaging of large items, and also have the capability to vacuum seal liquids. The lid generally travels straight up and down.
Automatic belt vacuum chamber packaging machines are commonly used for: * Fresh Meat (large portions) * Processed Meat * Large Sausage logs * Cheese (hard and soft)
== Thermoforming (rollstock) Vacuum Packaging Machines ==
[[File:VC999 i-Series Thermoform Packaging Machine.png|thumb|left|Thermoform packaging machines are used in larger production facilities for vacuum packaging products.]] Vacuum Packaging in large production facilities can be done with thermoforming machines. These are Form-Fill-Seal style machines that form the package from rolls of packaging film (webbing). Products are loaded into the thermoformed pockets, the top web is laid and sealed under a vacuum, producing vacuum packaged products. Thermoforming can greatly increase packaging production speed. Thermoformed plastics can be customized for size, color, clarity, and shape to fit products perfectly, creating a consistent appearance. One of the most commonly used thermoformed plastics is PET, known for a high-strength barrier resistant to outside tampering and an ease of molding into designated designs and shapes.<ref>{{Cite news|url=https://www.plasticingenuity.com/blog/pet-vs-pvc-plastics-which-material-is-better-for-packaging|title=PET vs. PVC: Which Material is Better for Packaging?|last=Ingenuity|first=Plastic|access-date=2017-12-19}}</ref> Some common uses for Thermoforming in vacuum packaging include: * Fresh & Marinated Meat * Sausage * Cheese * Candy / Chocolate * Grain * Grab-and-Go Snacks (beef jerky, snack sticks) * Pharmaceutical and Medical Products * Coins / Collectables
== Shelf life == Depending on the product, atmosphere, temperature, and the barrier properties of the package, vacuum packaging extends the [[shelf life]] of many foods.<ref>{{cite journal | last = Gorris | first =L G M | title =Modified Atmosphere and Vacuum Packaging to Extend the Shelf Life of Respiring Food Products | journal = HortTechnology | date =1992 | location = | pages =303-309 | volume = 2 | issue = 3 | url =http://horttech.ashspublications.org/content/2/3/303.full.pdf | isbn = | access-date =August 14, 2018 }}</ref><ref>{{cite journal | last = Beltran | first =David | title =Effect of different sanitizers on microbial and sensory quality of fresh-cut potato strips stored under modified atmosphere or vacuum packaging | journal = Postharvest Biology and Technology | date =2005 | location = | pages =37-46 | volume = 37 | issue = | url =http://ucanr.edu/datastoreFiles/608-381.pdf | isbn = | access-date = August 14, 2018 }}</ref> The shelf life of meats can be extended by vacuum packaging, particularly when used with [[modified atmosphere packaging]]. <ref>{{cite journal | last = Garcia-Esteban | first =Marta | title =Comparison of modified atmosphere packaging and vacuum packaging for long period storage of dry-cured ham: effects on colour, texture and microbiological quality | journal = Meat Science | date =2004 | location = | pages =57-63 | volume = 67 | issue = 1 | url =https://dadun.unav.edu/bitstream/10171/22986/1/Art%20map%20marta.pdf | isbn = | access-date = August 14, 2018 }}</ref> <ref>{{cite journal | last = Seidman | first =S C | title =VACUUM PACKAGING OF FRESH BEEF: A REVIEW | journal = Journal of Food Quality | date =1983 | location = | pages =29-47 | volume = 6 | issue = 1 | url =https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/pdf/10.1111/j.1745-4557.1983.tb00755.x | isbn = | access-date = August 14, 2018 }}</ref>
== High Barrier Shrink Vacuum Bags == The amount of shelf life enhanced by a vacuum bag is dependent on the structure in the material. A standard vacuum bag is composed of a PA/PE structure where PA is for puncture resistance and PE is for sealing. The high barrier category includes the usage of more layers focused on the prevention of oxygen permeability, and therefore shelf life protection. There are two materials used in high barrier structures, [[polyvinylidene chloride]] (PVDC) and ethylene vinyl alcohol ([[EVOH]]). Shelf life indication can be effectively measured by how many cubic centimeters of oxygen can permeate through 1 square meter of material over a 24-hour period. A standard PA/PE bag allows on average 100 cubic centimeters, PVDC allows on average over 10, and EVOH on average 1 cubic centimeter. Multi-layer structures allow the ability to use strong oxygen-barrier materials for enhanced shelf life protection. The PremiumPack structure is a good example of EVOH based high barrier shrink material.
== Preventing freezer burn ==
When foods are frozen without preparation, [[freezer burn]] can occur. It happens when the surface of the food is dehydrated, and this leads to a dried and leathery appearance. Freezer burn also ruins the flavor and texture of foods. Vacuum packing reduces freezer burn by preventing the food from exposure to the cold, dry air.
== Sous-vide cooking ==
Vacuum packaging also allows for a special cooking method, [[sous-vide]]. Sous-vide, [[French language|French]] for ''under vacuum'', involves poaching food that is vacuum sealed in a plastic bag.
==Food safety==
In an oxygen-depleted environment, [[Anaerobic organism|anaerobic bacteria]] can proliferate, potentially causing food-safety issues. Some pathogens of concern in vacuum packed foods are spore-forming non-proteolytic ''[[Clostridium botulinum]]'', [[Yersinia enterocolitica|''Yersenia enterocolitica'']], and ''[[Listeria monocytogenes]]''.<ref name=":0">{{Cite journal|last=Mills|first=John|last2=Donnison|first2=Andrea|last3=Brightwell|first3=Gale|title=Factors affecting microbial spoilage and shelf-life of chilled vacuum-packed lamb transported to distant markets: A review|url=https://doi.org/10.1016/j.meatsci.2014.05.002|journal=Meat Science|volume=98|issue=1|pages=71–80|doi=10.1016/j.meatsci.2014.05.002}}</ref> Vacuum packing is often used in combination with other food processing techniques, such as retorting or refrigeration, to inhibit the growth of anaerobic organisms.<ref name=":0" />
